column1: Uchi////I lived in Houston for 7 years before I actually tried Uchi
column2: and I don't know how I will ever eat any other sushi again... It's that serious. Excuse me for not being fancy
column3: but the first think I noticed was that there was no soy sauce on the table... so I was a little worried about that. Same when the sushi was actually served
column7: right? Wrong. If you put any of those things on the sushi they serve you
column8: you are a monster! :) Every piece is literally a masterpiece
column9: and infused with the best flavors.. so leave it alone!
